Two minute spates

Yikes, welcome back blog!

I lost my blog when an EC2 instance degraded and I had failed to make backups. Who want’s a word press blog anyway. I recovered all the other important files and applications and now that I’m using octopress backed up by github, there won’t be any more problems.

Since then I now work for a new company with the same old awesome people plus a good many new awesome people.

Kristina and I’ve also added one to my family.
